name: Mansion Killer
description:
Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fonPLXomfS8

There are 5 possible suspects who have committed a deadly crime...

Look around for clues and press E on the keyboard or Square/X on the gamepad to pick it up.

You will see green sparks if this clue identifies the killer.

Once you have the clues, take a good look at the portraits on the wall and try to deduce the killer based on the clues.
